author: The Linux Foundation
description:
🌐 Open source is expanding its reach—from autonomous drones to decentralized identity, from API standards to mapping infrastructure.

🧠 What kind of AI ecosystem are we building—and who’s driving it?
🗺️ Meta just made a huge shift in how maps are delivered at scale.
📚 GitBook’s next move could impact every API you use.
🔒 Can open source keep up with regulatory pressure and emerging threats?
📺 Watch the full breakdown in this week’s LF Quick Hits. 

#LFQuickHits #OpenSource #CyberResilience #OpenStandards #AI
title: 🌐 Open source is expanding its reach
